title: I Know Places (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:02.17] I-I-I, I, I-I-I, I
[00:05.10] I-I-I, I, I-I-I, I
[00:07.97] I-I-I, I, I-I-I, I, I, I
[00:14.10] You stand with your hand on my waistline
[00:17.05] It's a scene, and we're out here in plain sight
[00:19.91] I can hear them whisper as we pass by
[00:22.91] It's a bad sign, bad sign
[00:26.10] Somethin' happens when everybody finds out
[00:29.01] See the vultures circling, dark clouds
[00:31.93] Love's a fragile little flame, it could burn out
[00:35.01] It could burn out
[00:37.43] 'Cause they got the cages, they got the boxes
[00:42.56] And guns
[00:43.50] They are the hunters, we are the foxes
[00:48.33] And we run
[00:49.63] Baby, I know places we won't be found, and
[00:55.56] They'll be chasing their tails trying to track us down
[01:01.23] 'Cause I, I know places we can hide
[01:08.95] 
[01:11.36] I know places
[01:14.20] I know places
[01:16.99] Lights flash and we'll run for the fences
[01:19.95] Let them say what they want, we won't hear it
[01:23.09] Loose lips sink ships all the damn time
[01:26.09] Not this time
[01:28.66] Just grab my hand and don't ever drop it
[01:33.44] My love
[01:34.75] They are the hunters, we are the foxes
[01:39.24] And we run
[01:40.74] Baby, I know places we won't be found, and
[01:46.59] They'll be chasing their tails trying to track us down
[01:52.24] 'Cause I, I know places we can hide
[02:02.32] I know places
[02:04.78] They are the hunters, we are the foxes
[02:09.22] And we run
[02:10.63] Just grab my hand and don't ever drop it
[02:15.45] My love
[02:16.77] Baby, I know places we won't be found, and
[02:22.58] They'll be chasing their tails trying to track us down
[02:28.40] 'Cause I, I know places we can hide
[02:38.49] I know places
[02:40.52] (I) they take their shots, but we're bulletproof
[02:44.33] I know places
[02:46.68] (Hide) and you know for me, it's always you
[02:50.49] I know places
[02:52.70] (I) in the dead of night, your eyes so green
[02:56.21] I know places
[02:58.57] (Hide) and I know for you, it's always me
[03:02.33] I know places
[03:05.17] I-I-I, I, I-I-I, I
[03:08.02] I-I-I, I, I-I-I, I
[03:10.07]
